headline.main: FRENCH ARE URGED TO USE INGENUITY; Petain, Predicting Hard Year, Asks People to Overcome Expected Difficulties

abstract: Marshal Petain predicts hard yr and urges unity, New Yr's message; pub attitude to problems discussed; Pres Roosevelt's s on U S attitude not made pub
